channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report X-2023060417
item.description:
Report X-2023060417

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-03
  • City: NAMPA
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOADER PICKED UP PKG AND DISCOVERED IT WAS WET. NOTIFIED RESPONDER. RESPONDER ASSESSED WITH PPE MATERIALS, BUCKET AND RESPONSE SHEETS. RESPONDER REMOVED ALL AFFECTED PACKAGES, CLEANED UP IN TRAILER WAS PERFORMED WITH PH STRIP AND ZEP ZORBENT. CLEANUP AND DISPOSAL OF PRODUCT WAS PERFORMED AT DMP AND ZEP ZORBANT WAS APPLIED. ALL MATERIAL, INCLUDING CARDBOARD FROM OTHER PACKAGES WAS ALSO PLACED IN GREEN BAG.

item.title: Report E-2023060124
item.description:
Report E-2023060124

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-10
  • City: POCATELLO
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that the one metal 55 gallon drum of DK180 HV (un2290) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 2 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023060303
item.description:
Report X-2023060303

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-24
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023060303 SequenceEvent: AM QA discovered package leaking in unload. Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. DescribePack: This pail/bucket hazmat had a loose cap that spilled 2 fl. oz. of the content. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. 2. X-2023060305 SequenceEvent: AM QA discovered package leaking in unload. Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. DescribePack: The pail/bucket had a loose cap that resulted in 2 fl. oz. of the content spilling. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent.

item.title: Report X-2023060208
item.description:
Report X-2023060208

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-22
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PM QA discovered package leaking in QA Cage. Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. DescribePack: The jug/bottle was very full of liquid. Which seemed to cause to much pressure for the cap/closure. Causing a small amount of liquid to be squeezed out of the top. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent.

item.title: Report X-2023050269
item.description:
Report X-2023050269

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-03
  • City: RIGBY
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package pulled out of belly of trailer under a bunch of large packages. Package was wet, and then brought to QA for inspection . DescribePack: liquid in container inside of bag was leaking out and soaking the outside container . DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was brought to secure location after finding it was leaking .
